text: これは自虐では無く、普段の弟達の態度から見る予想だ。 不憫ネタに定評があると言えばカラ松、ネガティブな皮肉屋と言えば一松で良い勝負かもしれないが、いつもどれだけ構ってと言っても邪険にされる上に先日“ＮＥＷおそ松兄さん”なるものに立場を取られても全員が受け 入れていたぐらいにはおそ松は雑な扱いをされている。 それで好かれていると思う方が難しい。
trans: That's not self-deprecation, but a prediction based on how his brothers usually act. While Karamatsu with his tragic comic appeal, and Ichimatsu, the sarcastic pessimist may rival him somewhat, Osomatsu, always craving the attention of others, usually receives bad treatment. If anything, when the so-called "NEW Osomatsu-niisan" took his place the other day, all of his brothers simply followed along without hesitation. After all that, it would be harder to believe he's well-liked.
